proposition.

Proposition 2.1: High Dimensional CLT for Hyperrectangles

Suppose that conditions (M.1) and (M.2) are satisfied. Then, under (E.1), we have

3. High Dimensional CLT for Simple and Sparsely Convex Sets

In this section, we extend the results of Section 2 by considering larger
classes of sets; in particular, we examine classes of simple convex sets,
and obtain, under certain conditions, bounds that are analogous to those
in Section 2 (Proposition 3.1). Although an extension to simple convex
sets is not difficult, in high-dimensional spaces, the class of simple convex
sets is rather
